title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, choice text editor. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http:contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

id: 以get_legislators-抓取歷屆委員資料為例
what: 以get_legislators() 抓取「歷屆委員資料」為例
title: 以「歷屆委員資料」為例
text: 使用tidyverse協助做資料整理，計算「性別」之個數。 計算「黨籍」之個數 製作直方圖  製作圓餅圖  查看不同性別於不同政黨中之比例
code: library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ### library(tidyverse) #> ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────── tidyverse #> 1.3.2 ── #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.0     ✔ purrr   1.0.1 #> ✔ tibble  3.1.8     ✔ dplyr   1.1.0 #> ✔ tidyr   1.3.0     ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ readr   2.1.3     ✔ forcats 1.0.0 #> ── Conflicts ──────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag() info <- get_legislators(verbose = FALSE) #>  term is not defined... #>  You are now requesting full data from the API. Please make sure your connectivity is stable until its completion. legislators <- info$data legislators %>%    count(sex)  #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   sex       n #>   <chr> <int> #> 1 女      369 #> 2 男     1163 legislators %>%    count(party)  #> # A tibble: 12 × 2 #>    party            n #>    <chr>        <int> #>  1 中國國民黨     696 #>  2 台灣團結聯盟    26 #>  3 台灣基進         1 #>  4 台灣民眾黨       7 #>  5 建國黨           3 #>  6 新黨            33 #>  7 時代力量         7 #>  8 民主進步黨     591 #>  9 民國黨           1 #> 10 無黨團結聯盟    23 #> 11 無黨籍          49 #> 12 親民黨          95 library(ggplot2) party <- legislators %>%    count(party)  ggplot(data = legislators, aes(x = party)) +   geom_bar() +   theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) party_1 <- table(legislators$party) party.freq <- data.frame(party_1) names(party.freq)[1] <- "party"  ggplot(data = party.freq, aes(x = "", y = Freq, fill = party)) +   geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 1) +   coord_polar(theta = "y", start = 0) +   theme_void()+   theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) ggplot(data = legislators, aes(x = party, fill = sex)) +   geom_bar(position = "stack") +   # theme(text = element_text(family = "Heiti TC Light")) +   coord_flip()

title: User Manual
text: get_parlquestions(): parliarmentary questions asked legislators 提供議事日程本院委員之質詢事項資訊 (自第8屆) get_meetings(): spoken meeting records 委員發言 get_caucus_meetings(): meeting records cross-caucus session 提供公報之黨團協商資訊 (自第8屆) get_executive_response(): questions answered executives提供公報質詢事項行政院答復資訊 (自第8屆) get_public_debates(): public debates 提供公報之國是論壇資訊，並包含書面意見自 (自第8屆) get_speech_video(): full video information meetings committees 提供立法院院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 (自第9屆) get_committee_record(): records reviewed items committees 提供委員會會議審查之議案項目 (自第8屆)

title: User Manual
text: get_committee_record(): records reviewed items committees 提供委員會會議審查之議案項目 (自第8屆) get_bills(): records bills 法律提案 (能取得最早日不詳，待檢查) get_bills_2(): records legislators government bill proposals 提供委員及政府之議案提案資訊 (自第8屆) passed_legislation(): legislation information passed third reading 提供公報院會紀錄之三讀通過議案資訊。(自第8屆第1會期起) coming soon

title: User Manual
text: get_variable_info(): API’s endpoint user manuals 使用說明文件 get_legislators(): legislator demographics 提供委員基本資料

title: Quick Start
text: legisTaiwan R package accessing Taiwan Legislative Yuan API. goal legisTaiwan make quickly instantly download Taiwan’s legislative data, digitized textual video records research project analyze public policies. initial development part David Yen-Chieh Liao’ Dissertation project Electoral Reform, Distributive Politics, Parties Taiwanese Congress supported Taiwanese Overseas Pioneers Grant (TOP GRANT), National Science Technology Council (NSTC) Taiwan. package , therefore, great benefit researchers, students, policy analysts interested Taiwan legislative politics (Taiwan politics general) fewer financial resources. addition, annotation digitized text labelled topics video records may interest researchers students want build algorithm computational research social science well enhance transparency, accountability democracy towards country.
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("davidycliao/legisTaiwan", force = TRUE) library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ###

title: Quick Start
text: Contributions form comments, code suggestions, functions, tutorial examples welcome: Fork source code, modify, issue pull request project GitHub page welcome. Please read follow Contributor Code Conduct. Regarding issues, bug reports, wish lists, please file GitHub issue. Contact maintainer email: davidycliao[]cas.au.dk.

title: Authors and Citation
text: David Yen-Chieh Liao. Author, maintainer. Li Tang. Contributor, author. . Copyright holder, funder. Jou-Fei Huang. Contributor. Taiwan National Science Technology Council. Contributor. Taiwan Science & Technology Policy Research Information Center NARLabs. Contributor.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Liao D, Tang L (2023). legisTaiwan: Accessing Real-time Archives Taiwan Legislative Data R. R package version 0.1.4, https://davidycliao.github.io/legisTaiwan/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {legisTaiwan: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R},   author = {David Yen-Chieh Liao and Li Tang},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.4},   url = {https://davidycliao.github.io/legisTaiwan/}, }

what: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
title: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
text: legisTaiwan designed download real-time archives Taiwan legislative data easily. package includes many streamlined functions access Taiwan Legislative Yuan API efficiently perform analysis natural language processing tasks R without hassle runarounds.

title: Accessing Real-time and Archives of Taiwan Legislative Data in R
code: install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("davidycliao/legisTaiwan", force = TRUE) library(legisTaiwan) #> ## legisTaiwan                                            ### #> ## An R package connecting to the Taiwan Legislative API. ###

what: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: Records Bills 法律提案

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
code: get_bills(start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, proposer = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: start_date numeric Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g. 1090101. end_date numeric Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g. 1090102. proposer default value NULL, means bill proposed legislators included starting date ending date. verbose logical, indicates whether get_bills print detailed output retrieving data. default value TRUE.

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: list, contains: s title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://www.ly.gov.tw/Pages/List.aspx?nodeid=153; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_bills") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 sessionTimes 會次 meetingTimes 提案日期 billName 提案名稱 billProposer 主提案人 billCosignatory 連署提案 billStatus 議案狀態 date_ad 西元年

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: get_bills produces list, contains query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data.

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
text: 法律提案 API retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_bills"). Check Required: user manuals seems inconsistent actual data. 資料似乎不一致，取得最早時間不詳，待檢查。

title: The Records of the Bills 法律提案 — get_bills
code: ## query bill records by a period of the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format ## 輸入「中華民國民年」下載立法委員提案資料 get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1070310, verbose = FALSE) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion  ## query bill records by a period of the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format ## and a specific legislator ## 輸入「中華民國民年」與「指定立法委員」下載立法委員提案資料 get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1070310,  proposer = "孔文吉") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion  ## query bill records by a period of the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format ## and multiple legislators ## 輸入「中華民國民年」與「指定多個立法委員」下載立法委員提案資料 get_bills(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1060510,  proposer = "孔文吉&鄭天財") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2
code: get_bills_2(term = 8, session_period = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2
text: term numeric null. data available 8th term. default value 8. 參數必須為數值。資料從自第8屆起，預設值為8。 session_period numeric NULL. Available options session periods : 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. default NULL. 參數必須為數值。 verbose default value TRUE, displaying description data retrieved number, url computing time.

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2
text: list list, contains: title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=20; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_bills_2") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 sessionTimes 會次 meetingTimes 臨時會會次 billNo 議案編號 billName 提案名稱 billOrg 提案單位/委員 billProposer 主提案人 billCosignatory 連署提案 billStatus 議案狀態 pdfUrl 關係文書pdf檔案下載位置 docUrl 關係文書doc檔案下載位置 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2
text: get_bills_2 produces list, contains query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_bills_2").

title: The Records of Legislation and the Executives Proposals 委員及政府議案提案資訊 — get_bills_2
text: 議事類: 提供委員及政府之議案提案資訊 (自第8屆第1會期起)。

what: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: Meeting Records Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
code: get_caucus_meetings(start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: start_date character Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar three forward slashes year, month day, e.g. "106/10/20". end_date character Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar three forward slashes year, month day, e.g. "109/01/10". verbose logical, indicates whether get_caucus_meetings print detailed output retrieving data.

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: list, contains: title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=8; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_caucus_meetings") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: comVolume 期 comBookId 冊別 term 屆別 sessionPeriod 會期 meetingTimes 臨時會會次 meetingDate 會議日期(民國年) meetingName 會議名稱 subject 案由 pageStart 起始頁 pageEnd 結束頁 docUrl 檔案下載位置 htmlUrl html網址 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: get_caucus_meetings produces list, contains title, query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data.retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_caucus_meetings").

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
text: 議事類:提供公報之黨團協商資訊 (自第8屆第1會期起)

title: The Meeting Records of Cross-caucus Session 黨團協商資訊 — get_caucus_meetings
code: ## query the meeting records of cross-caucus session using a period of ## the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format with forward slash (/). ## 輸入「中華民國民年」下載「黨團協商」，輸入時間請依照該格式 "106/10/20"， ## 需有「正斜線」做隔開。 get_caucus_meetings(start_date = "106/10/20", end_date = "107/03/10") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

title: The Records of Reviewed Items in the Committees 委員會會議審查之議案項目 — get_committee_record
text: term numeric null. data available 8th term. default value 8. 參數必須為數值。資料從自第8屆起，預設值為8。 session_period integer, numeric NULL. Available options session : 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. default NULL. 參數必須為數值。 verbose logical, indicates whether get_executive_response print detailed output retrieving data. default TRUE

title: The Records of Reviewed Items in the Committees 委員會會議審查之議案項目 — get_committee_record
text: list contains: title records questions answered executives query_time queried time retrieved_number total number observations retrieved_term queried term url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=46; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_committee_record") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 meetingNo 會議編號 billNo 議案編號 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Records of Reviewed Items in the Committees 委員會會議審查之議案項目 — get_committee_record
text: get_committee_record produces list, contains title, query_time, retrieved_number, retrieved_term, url, variable_names, manual_info data. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_committee_record").

title: The Records of Reviewed Items in the Committees 委員會會議審查之議案項目 — get_committee_record
text: 議事類: 提供委員會會議審查之議案項目 (自第8屆第1會期起)。

title: The Legislator' Demographic Information and Background 提供委員基本資料 — get_legislators
text: list contains: query_time queried time queried_term queried term url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=16, use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_legislators") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: name 委員姓名 ename 委員姓名 sex 性別 party 黨籍 partyGroup 黨團 committee 委員會 onboardDate 到職日(西元年) degree 學歷 experience 經歷 picPath 照片位址 leaveFlag 離職日期(西元年) leaveReason 離職原因

text: get_legislators produces list, contains  query_time, queried_term, url, variable_names, manual_info data. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_legislators").

title: The Legislator' Demographic Information and Background 提供委員基本資料 — get_legislators
text: 提供委員基本資料，最早資料可追溯至第2屆。

title: The Legislator' Demographic Information and Background 提供委員基本資料 — get_legislators
code: ## query the Executives' answered response by term and the session period. ## 輸入「立委屆期」與「會期」下載「行政院答復」 get_executive_response(term = 8, session_period = 1) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

what: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
text: Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
code: get_meetings(   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   meeting_unit = NULL,   verbose = TRUE )

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
text: start_date numeric Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g. 1090101. end_date numeric Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar, e.g. 1090102. meeting_unit NULL default NULL, includes meeting types starting date ending date. verbose logical, indicates whether get_meetings print detailed output retrieving data.

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
text: list, contains: title spoken meeting records query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info offical manual, https://www.ly.gov.tw/Pages/List.aspx?nodeid=154; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_meetings") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: meeting_status 會議狀態 meeting_name 會議名稱 meeting_content 會議事由 speechers 委員發言名單 meeting_unit 主辦單位 date_ad 西元年

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
text: get_meetings produces list, contains title, query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data.retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_meetings"). Check Required: user manuals seems inconsistent actual data.

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
text: 資料似乎不一致，待確認。委員發言（取得最早時間不詳，待檢查。）

title: The Spoken Meeting Records 委員發言 — get_meetings
code: ## query meeting records by a period of the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format ## 輸入「中華民國民年」下載「委員發言」 get_meetings(start_date = "1050120", end_date = "1050210") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion  ## query meeting records by a period of the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format ## and a meeting ## 輸入「中華民國民年」與「審查會議或委員會名稱」下載會議審查資訊 get_meetings(start_date = 1060120, end_date = 1070310, meeting_unit = "內政委員會") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

what: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
text: Records Parliamentary Questions Asked Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
code: get_parlquestions(term = 8, session_period = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
text: term numeric null. data available 8th term. default set 8. 參數必須為數值。資料從自第8屆起，預設值為8。 session_period numeric NULL. Available options session : 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. default set NULL. 參數必須為數值。 verbose logical, indicates whether get_parlquestions print detailed output retrieving data. default TRUE

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
text: list contains: title records parliamentary questions query_time queried time retrieved_number total number observations retrieved_term queried term url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info offical manual https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=6, use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_parlquestions") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 sessionTimes 會次 item 項目 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
text: get_parlquestionsproduces list, containstitle, query_time, retrieved_number, retrieved_term, url, variable_names, manual_infoanddata. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_parlquestions")`.

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
text: 質詢類: 提供議事日程本院委員之質詢事項資訊(自第8屆第1會期起)。

title: The Records of Parliamentary Questions Asked by the Legislators 委員質詢事項資訊 — get_parlquestions
code: ## query parliamentary questions by term. ## 輸入「立委會期」下載立委質詢資料 get_parlquestions(term = 8) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion  ## query parliamentary questions by term. ## 輸入「立委屆期」與「會期」下載立委質詢資料 get_parlquestions(term = 8, session_period = 2) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion  ## query parliamentary questions by term. ## 輸入「空白」下載立委全部質詢資料 get_parlquestions(term = 8, session_period = 2) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

what: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
text: Records National Public Debates 國是論壇

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
code: get_public_debates(term = NULL, session_period = NULL, verbose = TRUE)

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
text: term numeric NULL default value 10 參數必須為數值，資料從自 第8屆第1會期起，但實測資料從第10屆，故預設為10。 session_period integer NULL. Available options session periods : 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. default NULL. 參數必須為數值。 verbose logical, indicates whether get_public_debates print detailed output retrieving data. default TRUE

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
text: list, contains: title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=7; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_public_debates") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 sessionTimes 會次 meetingTimes 臨時會會次 dateTimeDesc 日期時間說明 meetingRoom 會議地點 chairman 主持人 legislatorName 委員姓名 speakType 發言類型(paper:書面發言,speak:發言) content 內容 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
text: get_public_debates produces list, contains title, query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_public_debates").

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
text: 議事類: 提供公報之國是論壇資訊，並包含書面意見。自第8屆第1會期起，但實測資料從第10屆。

title: The Records of National Public Debates 國是論壇 — get_public_debates
code: ## query the Executives' answered response by term and the session period. ## 輸入「立委屆期」與「會期」下載國是論壇資訊。 get_public_debates(term = 10, session_period = 2) #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

title: The Video Information of Meetings and Committees 院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 — get_speech_video
text: start_date character Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar three forward slashes year, month day, e.g. "106/10/20". end_date character Must formatted ROC Taiwan calendar three forward slashes year, month day, e.g. "109/01/10". verbose logical, indicates whether get_meetings print detailed output retrieving data.

title: The Video Information of Meetings and Committees 院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 — get_speech_video
text: list, contains: title meeting records cross-caucus session query_time query time retrieved_number number observation meeting_unit meeting unit start_date_ad start date  POSIXct end_date_ad end date POSIXct start_date start date ROC Taiwan calendar url retrieved json url variable_names variables tibble dataframe manual_info official manual, https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=148; use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_speech_video") data tibble dataframe, whose variables include: sessionPeriod 會期 meetingDate 會議日期(西元年) meetingTime 會議時間 meetingTypeName 主辦單位 meetingName 會議名稱 meetingContent 會議事由 legislatorName 委員姓名 areaName 選區名稱 speechStartTime 委員發言時間起 speechEndTime 委員發言時間迄 speechRecordUrl 發言紀錄網址 videoLength 影片長度 videoUrl 影片網址 selectTerm 屆別期別篩選條件

title: The Video Information of Meetings and Committees 院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 — get_speech_video
text: get_speech_video produces list, contains title, query_time, retrieved_number, meeting_unit, start_date_ad, end_date_ad, start_date, end_date, url, variable_names, manual_info data. retrieve user manual information data frame, please use legisTaiwan::get_variable_info("get_speech_video").

title: The Video Information of Meetings and Committees 院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 — get_speech_video
text: 會議類:提供立法院院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 (自第9屆第1會期起)。

title: The Video Information of Meetings and Committees 院會及委員會之委員發言片段相關影片資訊 — get_speech_video
code: ## query full video information of meetings and committees using a period of ## the dates in Taiwan ROC calender format with forward slash (/). ## 輸入「中華民國民年」下載「委員發言片段相關影片資訊」，輸入時間請依照該 ## 格式 "105/10/20"，需有「正斜線」做隔開。 get_speech_video(start_date = "105/10/20", end_date = "109/03/10") #> Error: Please check the internet connetion

title: Check each function's manual — get_variable_info
text: Check function's manual

title: Check each function's manual — get_variable_info
code: get_variable_info(param_)

title: Check each function's manual — get_variable_info
text: param_ characters. Must one options : get_bills get_bills: records bills, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=6 get_bills_2 records legislators government proposals, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=6 get_meetings spoken meeting records, see https://www.ly.gov.tw/Pages/List.aspx?nodeid=154 get_caucus_meetings meeting records cross-caucus session, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=8 get_speech_video full video information meetings committees, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=148 get_public_debates records national public debates, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=7 get_parlquestions records parliamentary questions, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=6 get_executive_response records questions answered executives, see https://data.ly.gov.tw/getds.action?id=2

title: Check each function's manual — get_variable_info
text: list page_info information end point reference_url url page

title: Check each function's manual — get_variable_info
text: get_variable_info produces list, contains page_info reference_url.

title: legisTaiwan Version 0.1.4 (development version)
text: re-documentation inserting handlers. formatting website documentation: get_executive_response(), get_bills_2(), get_debates() get_speech_video(). get_bills() get_meeting()’s starting date clear. get_public_debates() manual information inconsistent actual data. ~~Two API endpoints,質詢事項(本院委員質詢部分) 國是論壇, temporarily . Therefore, data retrieved get_parlquestions() get_public_debates() may correct. [UPDATE: Feb 5 2023]~~ get_public_debates() . [UPDATE: Feb 7 2023]

text: get_executive_response(), get_bills_2(), get_debates() get_speech_video() added. package created get_meetings(), get_bills(), get_legislators(), get_parlquestions()
